item.title: API References
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
API, or Application Programming Interface, is the interface that a program uses to allow other applications to interact with it.

The post API References appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
API, or Application Programming Interface, is the interface that a program uses to allow other applications to interact with it.

Google Maps API v3
The newest google maps API
Find geo location
This is the best and most accurate way to get the latitude and longitude of an address for use with google maps.

The post API References appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: website solutions
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Every web developer has their favorite solution for a common website task, here's some of our favorites.

The post website solutions appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Every web developer has their favorite solution for a common website task, here’s some of our favorites. Please let us know if you know of a better solution for any of the tasks below.

Track Outbound Links & Downloads wGoogle Analytics
Automatically allows tracking document downloads and outbound links with Google Analytics (instead of adding the OnClick event handlers to every link you want to track) ~ Colm McBarron
PNG Alpha Fix
Allow 24bit transparent PNG images to work in IE 5.5 and IE6 PNG ~ Angus Turnbull
Insert Google Analytics Code
Automatically insert your google analytics code into your pages using javascript ~ Brent Lagerman

The post website solutions appeared first on mimoYmima.
